DOC.brief_summary: This study is to answer the question is there any relationship between viral ( HSV 1 , HSV 2 , HPV 6/11, CMV, HHV 6 , HHV 8, BKV) or bacterial (Porphyromonas gingivalis, Treponema denticola, Tannerella forsythia, Fusobacterium nucleatum) infection and occurrence of varicocele in men.
DOC.brief_title: The Search for Viral and Bacterial Etiology of Varicocele
DOC.criteria: in experimental arm varicocele grade II or III and infertility and/or pain in control arm: presence of varicocele in ultrasound before surgery
